description: OpenGL does not find driver on my machine and this does not run.
As I was able to taste this app I feel this is awesome app. But unfortunately after recent update was installed on my ubuntu 22.04 it is not working any more. I have no clue why this happened...
summary: only run once and then it is not working

description: Seems this snap is no longer working on ubuntu 22.04 (won't find opengl drivers?). The precompiled binary available in the maintainer's github repo seems to work though: https://github.com/mbrlabs/Lorien/releases/tag/v0.5.0 - love the application, great work and thanks!
